channel.title: RuinationRs.com 317 | Eco | Dicing | Hybridding | PKing | Comp Cape
channel.description:
[CENTER] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OYCNDLcZ8S8[/youtube]
[SIZE=6][FONT=Century Gothic]Welcome to RuinNation 317 [/FONT][/SIZE]
What is RuinNation?
At RuinNation our primary goal is to keep everything as realistic as possible. We offer you an amazing gameplay that you won't forget. That includes that we have fixed many bugs dupes and glitches and if we find a new
bug, we try our best to fix it as soon as possible. You can enjoy the RuinNation feeling together with a perfect eco system. Even the minor detail counts if you are coding a minigame or bosses, that's why we
offer you perfection!
[COLOR=#0ff85f][SIZE=3]Links[/SIZE][/COLOR] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img][url=http://www.ruinationrs.com]
Website/Forums[/url] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img]
[url=http://ruination.cf/forumdisplay.php?fid=3]Client Download[/url]
[B] Features:[/B] [I]- Oldschool items such as Staff of the death etc. - ALL Skills working with many different locations to level up - 24/7 VPS hosted - Double XP Friday-Sunday - Amazing Economy - Professional Drop-Rates - Amazing Skilling & Combat - Custom Bosses - Professional/Experienced Staff - Unique combination of PvP and PvE gameplay[/I] Reminder: We have alot more features.
[SPOILER=Media][img]http://i.gyazo.com/2cd09c517be4f175c6c49183b00cc46d.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/36f7d266e1dae4d6132b0a6659b75165.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/787a104958f355a7c657d3d2adbf43a1.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/f21ae55806b689b1782958f49cc023ea.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/d4990919612cd666ea079418443d5a5d.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/f9b0a18440fb61c5af6736532ebb2b65.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/4cc9c01bebd8778a67f2b8f0a0653920.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/4cc9c01bebd8778a67f2b8f0a0653920.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[SIZE=4]Come join us [url=http://ruination.cf/forumdisplay.php?fid=3]NOW![/url]
[/SIZE][/CENTER]
